title: PLAY Credit Card Offers : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
PLAY Credit Card – BMS Cash for successful applications
BMS Cash of INR 200/- will be rewarded to users successfully completing their PLAY credit card application.
BMS Cash will be valid for 30 days.
BMS Cash cannot be carried forward post expiry of the validity period.
PLAY Credit Card - Welcome Offer
Activate your PLAY credit card within 30 days of issuance, & get a discount of INR 500 on tickets on BookMyShow.
Offer valid for a period of 90 days from the date of first transaction.
Discount offer can be availed on all categories across BookMyShow.
Avail 2 free tickets up to a maximum discount of INR 250/- on each ticket.
 This is a one time use offer.
PLAY Credit Card Monthly Offer
On spends of INR 5,000 or more in one billing cycle, you get 2 free tickets on BookMyShow up to INR 500/-.
Offer will be available each month, subject to the spending amount.
For movie tickets, a minimum purchase of 2 tickets is required to avail the offer with a maximum discount of INR 250/- on each ticket.
Offer valid for a period of 30 days from the end of the billing cycle in which spend criteria of INR 5000/- has been fulfilled.
PLAY Credit Card - F&B Offer
Offer can be availed once every month using PLAY credit card.
Maximum discount of INR 100/- on F&B is available under this offer.
This offer is available only if F&B is booked along with movie tickets on BookMyShow.
